put.description: Creates or updates a Private DNS zone. Does not modify Links to virtual networks or DNS records within the zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the Private DNS zone. Omit this value to always overwrite the current zone. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Set to '*' to allow a new Private DNS zone to be created, but to prevent updating an existing zone. Other values will be ignored.

201.description: The Private DNS zone has been created.

200.description: The Private DNS zone has been updated.

202.description: The Private DNS zone upsert operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a Private DNS zone. Does not modify virtual network links or DNS records within the zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the Private DNS zone. Omit this value to always overwrite the current zone. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

200.description: The Private DNS zone has been updated.

202.description: The Private DNS zone update operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a Private DNS zone. WARNING: All DNS records in the zone will also be deleted. This operation cannot be undone. Private DNS zone cannot be deleted unless all virtual network links to it are removed.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the Private DNS zone. Omit this value to always delete the current zone. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally deleting any concurrent changes.

200.description: The Private DNS zone has been deleted.

202.description: The Private DNS zone delete operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The Private DNS zone was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets a Private DNS zone. Retrieves the zone properties, but not the virtual networks links or the record sets within the zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the Private DNS zones in all resource groups in a subscription.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of Private DNS zones to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 zones.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the Private DNS zones within a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of record sets to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 record sets.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a virtual network link to the specified Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: virtualNetworkLinkName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network link.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the virtual network link to the Private DNS zone. Omit this value to always overwrite the current virtual network link. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Set to '*' to allow a new virtual network link to the Private DNS zone to be created, but to prevent updating an existing link. Other values will be ignored.

201.description: The virtual network link to the Private DNS zone has been created.

200.description: The virtual network link to the Private DNS zone has been updated.

202.description: The operation to upsert virtual network link to the Private DNS zone has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a virtual network link to the specified Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: virtualNetworkLinkName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network link.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the virtual network link to the Private DNS zone. Omit this value to always overwrite the current virtual network link. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

200.description: The virtual network link to the Private DNS zone has been updated.

202.description: The operation to link virtual network link to Private DNS zone has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a virtual network link to the specified Private DNS zone. WARNING: In case of a registration virtual network, all auto-registered DNS records in the zone for the virtual network will also be deleted. This operation cannot be undone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: virtualNetworkLinkName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network link.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the virtual network link to the Private DNS zone. Omit this value to always delete the current zone. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally deleting any concurrent changes.

200.description: The virtual network link to the Private DNS zone has been deleted.

202.description: The operation to delete virtual network link to the Private DNS zone has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The virtual network link to the Private DNS zone was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets a virtual network link to the specified Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: virtualNetworkLinkName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual network link.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the virtual network links to the specified Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of virtual network links to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 virtual network links.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a record set within a Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of DNS record in this record set. Record sets of type SOA can be updated but not created (they are created when the Private DNS zone is created).

parameters.name: relativeRecordSetName
parameters.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the record set. Omit this value to always overwrite the current record set. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Set to '*' to allow a new record set to be created, but to prevent updating an existing record set. Other values will be ignored.

201.description: The record set has been created.

200.description: The record set has been updated.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a record set within a Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of DNS record in this record set.

parameters.name: relativeRecordSetName
parameters.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the record set. Omit this value to always overwrite the current record set. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.

200.description: The record set has been updated.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a record set from a Private DNS zone. This operation cannot be undone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of DNS record in this record set. Record sets of type SOA cannot be deleted (they are deleted when the Private DNS zone is deleted).

parameters.name: relativeRecordSetName
parameters.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the record set. Omit this value to always delete the current record set. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally deleting any concurrent changes.

200.description: The record set has been deleted.

204.description: The record set was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of DNS record in this record set.

parameters.name: relativeRecordSetName
parameters.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the record sets of a specified type in a Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of record sets to enumerate.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of record sets to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 record sets.

parameters.name: $recordsetnamesuffix
parameters.description: The suffix label of the record set name to be used to filter the record set enumeration. If this parameter is specified, the returned enumeration will only contain records that end with ".<recordsetnamesuffix>".

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists all record sets in a Private DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: privateZoneName
parameters.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of record sets to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 record sets.

parameters.name: $recordsetnamesuffix
parameters.description: The suffix label of the record set name to be used to filter the record set enumeration. If this parameter is specified, the returned enumeration will only contain records that end with ".<recordsetnamesuffix>".

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

maxNumberOfRecordSets.description: The maximum number of record sets that can be created in this Private DNS zone. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfRecordSets.description: The current number of record sets in this Private DNS zone. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

maxNumberOfVirtualNetworkLinks.description: The maximum number of virtual networks that can be linked to this Private DNS zone. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfVirtualNetworkLinks.description: The current number of virtual networks that are linked to this Private DNS zone. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

maxNumberOfVirtualNetworkLinksWithRegist.description: The maximum number of virtual networks that can be linked to this Private DNS zone with registration enabled. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfVirtualNetworkLinksWithRegistrat.description: The current number of virtual networks that are linked to this Private DNS zone with registration enabled. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

PrivateZoneProperties.description: Represents the properties of the Private DNS zone.

properties.description: Properties of the Private DNS zone.

value.description: Information about the Private DNS zones.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

PrivateZoneListResult.description: The response to a Private DNS zone list operation.

virtualNetwork.description: The reference of the virtual network.

registrationEnabled.description: Is auto-registration of virtual machine records in the virtual network in the Private DNS zone enabled?

virtualNetworkLinkState.description: The status of the virtual network link to the Private DNS zone. Possible values are 'InProgress' and 'Done'. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

VirtualNetworkLinkProperties.description: Represents the properties of the Private DNS zone.

etag.description: The ETag of the virtual network link.

properties.description: Properties of the virtual network link to the Private DNS zone.

VirtualNetworkLink.description: Describes a link to virtual network for a Private DNS zone.

value.description: Information about the virtual network links to the Private DNS zones.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

VirtualNetworkLinkListResult.description: The response to a list virtual network link to Private DNS zone operation.

ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address of this A record.

ipv6Address.description: The IPv6 address of this AAAA record.

cname.description: The canonical name for this CNAME record.

preference.description: The preference value for this MX record.

exchange.description: The domain name of the mail host for this MX record.

ptrdname.description: The PTR target domain name for this PTR record.

host.description: The domain name of the authoritative name server for this SOA record.

email.description: The email contact for this SOA record.

serialNumber.description: The serial number for this SOA record.

refreshTime.description: The refresh value for this SOA record.

retryTime.description: The retry time for this SOA record.

expireTime.description: The expire time for this SOA record.

minimumTtl.description: The minimum value for this SOA record. By convention this is used to determine the negative caching duration.

priority.description: The priority value for this SRV record.

weight.description: The weight value for this SRV record.

port.description: The port value for this SRV record.

target.description: The target domain name for this SRV record.

value.description: The text value of this TXT record.

metadata.description: The metadata attached to the record set.

ttl.description: The TTL (time-to-live) of the records in the record set.

fqdn.description: Fully qualified domain name of the record set.

isAutoRegistered.description: Is the record set auto-registered in the Private DNS zone through a virtual network link?

aRecords.description: The list of A records in the record set.

aaaaRecords.description: The list of AAAA records in the record set.

cnameRecord.description: The CNAME record in the record set.

mxRecords.description: The list of MX records in the record set.

ptrRecords.description: The list of PTR records in the record set.

soaRecord.description: The SOA record in the record set.

srvRecords.description: The list of SRV records in the record set.

txtRecords.description: The list of TXT records in the record set.

RecordSetProperties.description: Represents the properties of the records in the record set.

id.description: The ID of the record set.

name.description: The name of the record set.

type.description: The type of the record set.

etag.description: The ETag of the record set.

properties.description: The properties of the record set.

RecordSet.description: Describes a DNS record set (a collection of DNS records with the same name and type) in a Private DNS zone.

value.description: Information about the record sets in the response.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

RecordSetListResult.description: The response to a record set list operation.

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Example - '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/privateDnsZones/{privateDnsZoneName}'.

type.description: The type of the resource. Example - 'Microsoft.Network/privateDnsZones'.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for an ARM proxy resource.

CloudError.description: An error response from the service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the service.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
